mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM vmb.pms WHERE "to" = #{mod} AND unread = TRUE

SELECT p.id, p.sender, p.to, p.message, p.time, p.unread, f.username, t.username AS to_username FROM vmb.pms p LEFT JOIN vmb.mods f ON f.id = p.sender LEFT JOIN vmb.mods t ON t.id = p.to WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.id, p.sender, p.to, p.message, p.time, p.unread, f.username FROM vmb.pms p LEFT JOIN vmb.mods f ON f.id = p.sender WHERE p.to = #{mod} ORDER BY p.unread DESC, p.time DESC
